attachments.title: Data.List: add new() by ujihisa 路 Pull Request #630 路 vim-jp/vital.vim
attachments.text: Ruby has the following feature: Array.new(10) { rand(10) } #=> [1, 9, 5, 0, 7, 0, 3, 3, 8, 2] With this patch, you can do similar thing with vital.vim. s:List.new(10, { -> s:Random.range(0, 9...
